sections.heading: Service; nonresident parentIf a parent against whom a proceeding is instituted does not reside within this state, service of citation shall be made by registered or certified mail to the address indicated in the petition, return receipt required, not less than five days prior to commencement of the
sections.text: Service; nonresident parentIf a parent against whom a proceeding is instituted does not reside within this state, service of citation shall be made by registered or certified mail to the address indicated in the petition, return receipt required, not less than five days prior to commencement of the hearing on the matter.Acts 1991, No. 235, ยง10, eff. Jan. 1, 1992; Acts 2021, No. 158, ยง1.
